gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pistons 96, Wizards 87
gameRecap.excerpt: Cade Cunningham led Detroit with 33 points (13-33 FG), eight rebounds, and seven assists while Jalen Duren added 20 points and 17 rebounds as Detroit defeated Washington, 96-87. Corey Kispert (23 points, six rebounds) and Deni Avdija (18 points, 11 rebounds, nine assists) led Washington in the loss. The Pistons move to 13-61 as the Wizards fall to 14-60.
